title: (x) Athens Country Club - Monotype Script {Lex}
content:
Hello

Would you please identify the font for “Country Club?”

Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070813140110im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ACC.jpg)

 [‹ Langdale's vintage packaging lettering](http://web.archive.org/web/20070813140110/http:/typophile.com/node/19458 "Go to previous forum topic") [Vibe Tanning Salon fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070813140110/http:/typophile.com/node/19479 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misalion

comments.content:
It looks like a horribly, horribly squooshed [Monotype Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20070813140110/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.126005.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Country+Club&sampleSize=48).

- Lex
